extendedInfo.description: One of the most difficult games ever made! Take up the challenge and test yourself!Discover all the hidden secrets of the Book of Shadows and see how far your mind can go!A very engaging, exciting and entertaining game!Full and FreeFeatures:âª Carefully detailed 3D graphicsâª Two languages: English, Italian (Click on the flag to change the language)âª By unlocking the shape in one language, you will automatically unlock it in the other oneâª 38 pages, 4 shapes per page, for a total of 152 shapes to discover!âª Start with 20 coins and like us on facebook to get other 20 coinsâª Get 2 coins for each shape correctly guessed, or get them from the serverâª Spend your coins to get hints (1 coin for each hint, up to 3 hints per shape)âª Spend your coins to get the solution (10 coins), if you canât manage to guess the shape âª The game can be enjoyed both alone and in company, anytime, anywhere, by players of all agesâª New shapes will be added with an update, just play and see what will come next!Further notes:âª Should you find any wrong answer, please send us an by e-mailâª If you enjoy the game, support us by buying the âdonationâ version, thanks!

reviews.comment: Hard. Think some answer right but game say wrong?
reviews.author: Mekia Chatman
